name: Tynk! and the Final Phonorecord
storyline: When you've spent your life struggling to get mainstream recognition, there are few lengths you wouldn't go to in order to figure out why and correct course. Tynk is on a mission to show her new mixtape to everyone who's anyone, and she's going to need your help to do it!
summary: Tynk! and the Final Phonorecord is a story about creating art, making friends, and exploring the weird grey area that exists between art and commodity. It's a goofy, thoughtful and sometimes moody little adventure starring an overzealous musician, Tynk Nimbus, on a quest to make her new album the next big thing. Solve puzzles, avoid bodily harm, and travel the coast on your quest to show your album to everyone who's anyone! Just remember to brace yourself-- safely navigating feedback is Tynk's biggest challenge yet.
